text: Pas, kase, ki [ʙardaero] najoʙad, peş az omezişi çinsī du moh pajopaj rūza ʙigirad va kase, ki nametavonad [rūza ʙigirad, dar on surat] ʙojad şast miskinro taom dihad. In [kaffora] ʙaroi on ast, ki ʙa Alloh taolo va rasulaş imon ʙijovared va inho hududi [ahkomi] ilohī ast va ʙaroi kofiron azoʙi dardnoke [dar peş] ast
